we.9: We reserve the right to change the terms of this policy or the Terms of Use (at any time). we.10: Where we take appropriate and effective security measures to protect data from unauthorized access or unauthorized alteration, disclosure or destruction, this includes internal reviews of our data collection, storage and processing practices and security measures, including unauthorized access to those systems. CDN cloud front end protection and appropriate encryption and physical security measures where we store data. All information collected on  SarkariResult.Com website is stored securely in our controlled database/server. The database is stored on secure AWS servers behind firewalls/modules; Access to the server is VPN/auto scaling and password protected and strictly limited. However, as effective as our security measures are, no security system is impenetrable. We cannot guarantee the security of our AWS Server/Database, nor can we guarantee that the information you provide will not be intercepted while being transmitted to us over the Internet.

information.9: Log Files: Each time you visit the Website, SarkariResult.Com servers automatically receive log information from your browser and the device that was used to access the Platform (such as IP address, device ID, Details and type of your network operator, your operating system), browser type and version, CPU speed, and connection speed). This enables us to validate you as a user, understand your use of the Website and helps us make changes and updates that best suit your needs and interests.

information.10: Mobile Device: When you use  SarkariResult.Com on your mobile device, in addition to the above we will also collect device information such as mobile device ID, model and manufacturer details, operating system, etc. The purpose of improving the overall functionality of the App and displaying content as per your preferences.

information.11: Cookies and Web Beacons: Like any other website, sarkariresult.com uses "cookies". These cookies are used to store information including visitors' preferences, and the pages on the website that the visitor accessed or visited. The information is used to optimize the users' experience by customizing our web page content based on visitors' browser type and/or other information.

We cannot guarantee the security of our AWS Server/Database, nor can we guarantee that the information you provide will not be intercepted while being transmitted to us over the Internet.

AI.0:
Log Files: Each time you visit the Website, SarkariResult.Com servers automatically receive log information from your browser and the device that was used to access the Platform (such as IP address, device ID, Details and type of your network operator, your operating system), browser type and version, CPU speed, and connection speed). This enables us to validate you as a user, understand your use of the Website and helps us make changes and updates that best suit your needs and interests.
	Mobile Device: When you use  SarkariResult.Com on your mobile device, in addition to the above we will also collect device information such as mobile device ID, model and manufacturer details, operating system, etc. The purpose of improving the overall functionality of the App and displaying content as per your preferences.
	Cookies and Web Beacons: Like any other website, sarkariresult.com uses "cookies". These cookies are used to store information including visitors' preferences, and the pages on the website that the visitor accessed or visited. The information is used to optimize the users' experience by customizing our web page content based on visitors' browser type and/or other information.
	Google DoubleClick DART Cookie : Google is one of a third-party vendor on our site. It also uses cookies, known as DART cookies, to serve ads to our site visitors based upon their visit to www.website.com and other sites on the internet. However, visitors may choose to decline the use of DART cookies by visiting the Google ad and content network Privacy Policy at the following URL – https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads
	Our Advertising Partners : Some of advertisers on our site may use cookies and web beacons. Our advertising partners are listed below. Each of our advertising partners has their own Privacy Policy for their policies on user data. Google, Adpushup, VDO.AI
	Children's Information : Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.
	sarkariresult.com does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.
